title: Mini-Ep 187: Love Gives Us Hope
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 187: Love Gives Us Hope
itunes:subtitle: Kate buys fancy joggers and Doree pays a masked visit to her hair salon. Then, listeners discuss anxiety about re-entering society after COVID, how to shop for underwear, and what brings them hope. They also discuss the wave of hate crimes committed ag...
description:
Kate buys fancy joggers and Doree pays a masked visit to her hair salon. Then, listeners discuss anxiety about re-entering society after COVID, how to shop for underwear, and what brings them hope. They also discuss the wave of hate crimes committed against the AAPI community, including the murder of eight people in Atlanta, six of whom were Asian women.


We've made donations on behalf of the podcast to Red Canary Song and Stop AAPIHate. For a comprehensive list of places to donate to that support AAPI communities, click here. For information about bystander intervention training, click here and here.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

STRIVECTIN - Learn more at StriVectin.com. Email subscribers receive 15% off their first order.

ETTITUDE - Get 20% off your order, plus free shipping, when you visit ettitude.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35.

SQUARESPACE - Head to Squarespace.com/FOREVER35 and use the offer code FOREVER35 to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
